WRITING.TEXT: It's a problem with the servers, not the accounts, if I'm not mistaken. And I'm not willing to give up the time I've spent on MyCareer and MyTeam, much less the 11 and a half months of Xbox Live gold I have left on my actual account.

WRITING.TITLE: IWTL how to come up with fun hangout ideas when people say "what do we do now?"
WRITING.TEXT:
We're going to a restaurant soon and someone is asking what we will do after. No one is answering... I would LOVE to suggest a random bar/club. Why? No. Why the fuck not?
But they're the kind of people who will immediately shoot down the idea.
What else can we do? It's winter, freezing cold outside usually. We're all guys in this case.

WRITING.TITLE: In the midst of all the bullshit, I thought the reply was hilarious.

WRITING.TEXT: I will now, thank you!

Dude they always play their game! They livestream all the time! Their game works, unlike ours! They don't give a shit, instead of talking about the issues or apologizing let me tweet about the shitty roster update that should've been done a week ago!
And it's not even good. Get Lucky? I mean it's a good song, but for basketball? ahah
Rats.
Where do you select it? I meant outside of MyCareer, since I can't access it right now.
I just did.
I'm on Xbox One. I do just that. It gives me some injured players, like Kobe, but it doesn't give Rose. Does it work well for you?
It's a video game. How come I can play with Kobe right now, but not Rose?
You don't get it do you...
Oh my God, I meant remove his injury...

WRITING.TITLE: How can I make injured players like D Rose playable in quick games?

WRITING.TEXT: You were definitely the only one.

MyGM, pretty much the next gen equivalent of association, MyCareer and MyTeam.
Some people have it better than me (eg: they can play MyTeam but not MyCareer) and some have no problems at all.
A lot of people have problems though.

You can do that. But there's also other MUCH more interesting game modes that everyone prefers playing 10 out of 10 times, and we can't play those.
It's only on next gen, as far as I know.

NBA 2K14
Best game ever, except the servers don't work right now and they implemented an always online DRM in a patch post release! AWESOME!

I hated the xJawz part, just because the topics weren't interesting at all :s
The normal part in the middle was great!
I dislike the Ryan segment. I didn't like him from the start when he mentioned a hypothetical where if an old lady were to get hit by a car, he'd laugh. I noticed he was a dick from the start. Also, how often does someone need to curse? Jesus.
I disliked it because I still feel really sorry for him. I get that he deserves it, but I'm such an empathetic guy in real life, that I always feel sorry for the "bad" guys when they get what's coming to them. The hosts seem like villains for egging him on and hyping the show up to make sure a lot of people see it.
But whatever, can't wait till PKA 162 and so on.

We don't have the balls to speak our mind? Are these guys fucking kidding? You better be damn sure I'm gonna think twice before saying something that might hurt people. Any rational human being would. It's called common decency.
I second the copy and paste thing, but it's not just on Twitter. I sent in two tickets, two different issues to their customer support service a week apart. Both replies were *exactly* the same.

WRITING.TITLE: I watched the pre show again after the actual show. It made so much sense.
WRITING.TEXT: I dunno, just wanted to say this. Go try it.

WRITING.TITLE: How the hell do you play 2-player quick games in this game?
WRITING.TEXT: I can connect both controller to the game for one match, but every single time, after the match, one of them disappears. How do we get it to reconnect. I don't know what we've been doing to make it reconnect, but it does sometimes.
But they've been tweeting that for the past 3 weeks...
Apparently Nike is better.

I didn't care for him at all. This was just an average PKA. The xJawz part was annoying because it's xJawz, the "normal" part was great and fun to listen to, and Ryan oh my God. lol
When I saw all the hype about the show, I got excited. For me, I can think of 20 other episodes that were much, much better/funnier.

WRITING.TITLE: If I delete the game from my Xbox One, will I lose my MyTeam?
WRITING.TEXT:
So for the past 3 weeks I haven't been able to play anything except quick games, blacktop and MyTeam.
Since today, it's down to just quick games.
Some people say if you delete and reinstall the game it fixes the 2K sports servers issues. Will it delete my MyTeam though? I don't wanna lose all my players.
May someone explain to me what this code is and where you get it from?
I think I've made at least 6 files across these two. Can you link the thread?
If you're lucky enough try to get Dennis Schroeder from the Hawks. Dude's super fast with a 97 speed and great all around shooter. I'm aiming for Gerald Green right now.

WRITING.TITLE: What all bronze lineup do you use in MyTeam to maximize your points?
WRITING.TEXT: I know the more blocks and steals, the better. But there's also points and the win. Which bronze players are the best, that guarantee a 3 star pack all the time?
Eastern time. It expires in 9 hours and 3 minutes.

Funny you mention this. I just played that best team in Domination with all bronze players. Down by 3 with 10 seconds left. I inbound to a wide open guy who's 10ft away from me, the pass goes out of bounds. I still sent it to overtime though and got the win, somehow.

WRITING.TITLE: Anybody else blow very simple passes often?
WRITING.TEXT:
I just had 3 possessions in a row, I repeat, in a row, messed up because a wide open Lebron James tried to pass the ball to a wide open Dwyane Wade, but instead the ball passed next to Wade and went out of bounds.
A worse feeling is when you inbound the ball with no opponent in sight, and the ball just goes out of bounds.
This is really frustrating, especially seeing how it's Lebron, a guy with an 85+ pass rating. The pass rating doesn't even matter, a guy with a 25 rating could make these passes.
This shouldn't happen as often as it does. It happens to me at least twice a game. I'm not a bad player by any means.
EDIT: An even WORSE thing is when you direct a flashy pass to, let's say, the player to the right, and it passes to the player in the opposite direction, which results in a turnover. Lol

I started playing online today, encountered this problem at least 5 times.
I guess it's not that bad. It *is* a waste of 3min when you just wanna get one game in as quickly as possible. But I'll take the win and the effortless 4500 points.

Ok right now I'm doing the Gold player tournament (singleplayer, not multiplayer). I've won 2/5 games so far. It says the award is 10 000 MyTeam points, but it doesn't mention anything about a ruby/sapphire pack.

WRITING.TITLE: I know what bronze, silver and gold packs are. What are sapphire and ruby?
WRITING.TEXT: How do you get them? Are they available on next gen?
I saw in a thread on OperationSports it's at least 5. So I tried and yeah, with 5 you can get 3 stars. But always go for more, the more the merrier why not

I just realized the price I mentioned are for bronze players, they differ.
And to get 3 stars, use only bronze players, try to get 5+ blocks, some steals, and 3-4 of your players in double figures.

You can buy contracts when you run out. 1 for 50 VC/MT or 5 for 200 VC/MT.
And I'm doing well so far. I've only played domination and have a whole gold lineup with some of the best players in history. I feel like I'm gonna piss a lot of people off when I start playing road to playoffs :/

WRITING.TITLE: You can reset stars in MyTeam Domination.
WRITING.TEXT:
So this guy found a way you can reset stars in Domination mode. You can only do it one team at a time though. I haven't tried yet. I will in an hour and I'll report back with an edit,
If it does work, I think it's useful! I'm guessing they'll patch it, use this method while you can.
Source: http://www.operationsports.com/forums/nba-2k-my-team-next-gen/695193-reset-your-myteam-domination-mode.html
EDIT: It works. All you do is, as soon as your start up the game and get past the loading screen, just pause and quit. Remember this will consume contracts. I did this with the Knicks because I didn't get the 3 star pack for some reason, got cheated out of it.
I've only played since 2k12. It's definitely my favourite so far. 2k14 is great too, but doesn't feel like it blends well with basketball.
Yeah for me it's the same thing when it comes to 1-3-1, constant corner 3s.

Will this affect my MyTeam? I don't wanna lose my players.

Mostly getting the 3 stars in domination. Also I haven't been able to play MyCareer or MyGM for 3 weeks now and I had a lot of VC saved up for those. I said screw it and spent it on gold packs. And locker codes.

WRITING.TEXT:
In one of Chris Smoove's videos, he did some of the Park moves with his player in the NBA (not the Park), which is illegal, since some are carries and I think some are technically travels.
This is a glitch, but it is a fun glitch. I hope they don't patch it, it doesn't harm anyone. How can you do them? I equipped them on MyPlayer's animations and I can't do them at all.
Yeah, I was surprised. Some people rated lower than him are gold (like Denarcus Cousins and Al Horford).
